name: Careful Observation
flavor: A moment of focus leaves a foe firmly in your sights.

metadata.flavor: A moment of focus leaves a foe firmly in your sights.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: As long as you remain within distance of the target, maintain line of effect to them, and strike no other creature first, you gain an edge on the next strike you make against the assessed creature, and gain 1 surge you can use only on that strike.
